courses.title: Java Full Stack
courses.description: Master both front-end and back-end development using Java technologies. Learn Spring Boot, REST APIs, and database integration to build complete web applications.

courses.title: Machine Learning
courses.description: Understand supervised and unsupervised learning, build predictive models, and apply algorithms like regression, decision trees, and neural networks.

courses.title: Data Analytics
courses.description: Learn to effectively clean, process, and visualize data using tools like Python, Excel, and Tableau. Analyze trends, create dashboards, and make data-driven decisions.

courses.title: Data Security
courses.description: Protect sensitive information with security protocols, cryptography, and ethical hacking techniques. Understand how to prevent breaches and threats.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: Explore the foundations of AI including NLP, computer vision, and deep learning. Build intelligent systems that can perceive, reason, and act.

courses.title: React JS
courses.description: Build interactive user interfaces using modern JavaScript and React. Learn component architecture, hooks, routing, and state management.

courses.title: Web Development
courses.description: Get hands-on with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks to create responsive and dynamic websites from scratch.

courses.title: Node JS
courses.description: Develop scalable server-side applications with Node.js. Learn Express.js, RESTful APIs, and real-time communication using WebSockets.

courses.title: JavaScript
courses.description: Deep dive into core JavaScript concepts including ES6, DOM manipulation, asynchronous programming, and browser APIs.
